ThingDef.Name: CMC_EMPsword_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona neutronium sword
ThingDef.description: A ultra-tech sword made from incredibly dense and strong material. It is able to generate EMP pulse upon contact with a implanted EMP generator.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_EMPsword_sevenstars_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona anti-entropy sword
ThingDef.description: A modified neutronium sword with a inboard persona core, enable with user with abilities upon biocoding.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: TangDao_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona CeleTech blade
ThingDef.description: A ultra tech blade which has a traditional look.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: TangDaoPersona_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona persona CeleTech blade
ThingDef.description: A ultra tech blade which has a traditional look. This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBU_TOOE_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-301C sniper
ThingDef.description: The first generation of high-caliber charged sniper designed by CeleTech, using gunpowder to trigger charging. Due to the limitation of technology, it is bulky and complicated, but it is extremely accurate.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBU_sixsix_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-66 charged sniper
ThingDef.description: A heavy anti-vehicle sniper developed in 2060s, its 20mm unstable charged-shots explodes violently upon contact with objects.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZ_fivenine_MOD_X_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ-59X Assault Rifle
ThingDef.description: A prototype charged assault rifle, its bullets can ignite target upon hit with a large amount of reduction in damage. It is inaccurate at long range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZ_fivenine_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ-59QL assault rifle
ThingDef.description: A second-generation charged-shot assault rifle named after the god of thunder, QiangLiang. This rifle fires high-penetration bullets at rapid rate and its large-capacity magazine allows it to effectively suppress enemies at medium to close range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

li.description: Using grenade launcher to fire stun grenades that incapables enemy.

ThingDef.Name: QBB_fivenine_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBB-59QL LMG
ThingDef.description: A light machine gun designed based on QBZ-59C. It provides fire support for squads.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZ71_QS_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ-71H smart combat rifle
ThingDef.description: A heavy combat rifle firing 8mm charged bullets, it is bulky but extremely accurate.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

li.description: Using grenade launcher to fire stun grenades that incapables enemy.

ThingDef.Name: QBZ_threeooE_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ-95CE assault rifle
ThingDef.description:
Developed in the 2030s, QBZ-95CE is a pioneer in charged assault rifles. Due to the limitation of technology, it is bulky, complicated and inaccurate.

A stun grenade launcher is attached to this weapon.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

li.description: Using grenade launcher to fire stun grenades that incapables enemy.

ThingDef.Name: W85XWJ_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBB-85X smart LMG
ThingDef.description:
A smart LMG firing guide bullets that can always hit the target, it can also switch mode to fire normal under emergency situations.

Mode Switch:Firing guided bullets that track targets(Halved penetration and reduced damage)/normal bullets at high rate.

This weapon's accuracy at smart mode is based on users's intellectual skill ONLY.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_QBU71S_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-71 smart sniper
ThingDef.description: A smart anti-vehicle sniper firing high-penetration projectiles. Its specially designed hypersonic projectiles are able to penetrate shields.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBU71_QS_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-71-JW tactical sniper
ThingDef.description: A multi-functional tactical sniper modified from QBU-71, its experimental bullets containing mechanites provides two modes: paralyze its foes, or completely burn down their Nervous system. However, its bullet needs to decelerate before impact, causing minor damage to targets immune to mechanites and unable to penetrate shields.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_QBUS85X_Flame_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-85SF smart sniper(incendiary)
ThingDef.description: A product of reverse engineering from a mechanoid's hellsphere cannon, its guided fuel bullets can melt down armor and ignite target.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBUS85XWJ_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZS-85X smart sniper
ThingDef.description:
A smart sniper, it fires guided bullets which can accurately hit moving target at long range.

This weapon's accuracy is based on users's intellectual skill ONLY.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_QBXfiveseven_CSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBX-57C smart shotgun
ThingDef.description:
A charged shotgun that launches 9 guided slugs and hit a single enemy simultaneously.

This weapon's accuracy is based on users's intellectual skill ONLY.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_QBXninenine_CSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBX-99S shotgun
ThingDef.description: A development from QBX-57C, it is quicker to fire and releases more bullets per shot. Bullets are guided towards multiple targets by a small phased-array radar on its barrel.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZoneooneXuanMing_Elite_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ-101AE-XM EM-Rifle
ThingDef.description:
A top-secret prototype based on XuanMing EM-Rifle, firing experimental anti-entropy projectiles, cooling targets down to absolute zero.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

This weapon's bullets are too fast to be blocked by force shield.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZoneooneXuanMing_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ-101C-XM EM-Rifle
ThingDef.description:
A powerful smart assault rifle originated from a rapid anti-air electro-magnetic launcher. Its High-velocity guided projectiles can easily penetrate armor and cause a EMP burst upon contact as well.

This weapon's bullets are too fast to be blocked by force shield.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZS85XWJ_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QSZ-85X smart SMG
ThingDef.description:
A smart SMG developed by CMC in the 2080s, equipped with the latest fire control system and micro guided bullets. However, guided bullet has lower penetration due to loss of kinetic energy during its flight. 

Mode Switch:Firing guided bullets that track targets/ high-penetration charged bullets at high rate.

This weapon's accuracy at smart mode is based on users's intellectual skill ONLY.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMM_PLaserpistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QSC-79P pistol
ThingDef.description:
A prototype laser pistol, it can target three enemies simultaneously. 

Damage: 8-4-4 with 10s of burning upon hit. Target enemies within 4 tiles.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_PLaserSMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-79P SMG
ThingDef.description:
A prototype laser SMG, can target three enemies simultaneously. 

Damage: 10-5-5 with 10s of burning upon hit. Target enemies within 5 tiles.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_PLaserLMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-79P LMG
ThingDef.description:
A prototype laser LMG, can attack four enemies simultaneously. 

 Damage: 15-15-8-8 with 10s of burning upon hit. Target enemies within 6 tiles.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_Shaped_Laser_Sniper_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBUL-56 particle beam sniper
ThingDef.description: A heavy particle beam sniper that does large amount of damage over long range, able to penetrate shields.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_ShapedLaserRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-55 particle beam rifle
ThingDef.description: First generation of particle beam rifle, which is able to penetrate its target with energized particle. It is very effective against close-ranged targets.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_ShenLongLaserLMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-102P ShenLong LMG
ThingDef.description: A prototype laser LMG, can attack seven enemies simultaneously, the greater the number of enemies in range, the more powerful this laser gun is.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_TaoTie_Persona_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-823 TaoTieII particle lance
ThingDef.description: A prototype particle lance. Its reactor is replaced with a stabilized microscopic skipgate linked to the core of a nearby star. Its beam ignores any armor and cause explosions upon contact.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_TaoTie_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-822 TaoTie inferno lance
ThingDef.description: A powerful prototype rifle, which fires large focused beams of highly energized particles and cause massive damage. It is extremely effective against armored targets at close range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_HJX_ATGM_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona HJ-53 ATGM Launcher
ThingDef.description: An individual anti-tank missile launcher, equipped with HJ-53 light ATGM missile.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PrototypeXiHe_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Prototype-XH flameblaster
ThingDef.description: An advanced spacer burst-oriented long-range flamethrower, very efficient against organism and also able to melt mechanoids' armors.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QLUX_Pulse_Projector_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QLU-X pulse cannon
ThingDef.description: Named after Zhu Rong, the god of fire for its devastating power, QLU-X is a powerful pulse projector used by PLA in 2080s.Due to its high accuracy and long range of fire, QLU-X is able to easily suppress enemy battle positions, bunkers and slower targets. It must hold a bead on its target for several seconds while charging, before it releases a devastating tsunami of power. The explosion is capable of melting concrete in its blast radius. The heat of the explosion will ignite anything nearby. It cannot fire at close-up targets to prevent friendly fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QLUX_Pulse_Projector_Persona_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QLU-X-ZHII pulse cannon
ThingDef.description: A prototype plasma cannon originated of QLU-X, with enhanced firepower. Its energy pulse can also emit EMP burst upon contact.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_RocketLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona FF120 rocket launcher
ThingDef.description: A single-use individual rocket launcher that fires a 120mm anti-infantry thermobaric rocket.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_QSZfiveseven_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QSZ-57 PDW
ThingDef.description: A personal-defense weapon based on ancient blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It is light to carry and quick to fire, which makes it popular among pilots and frontier explorers.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Bullet_AutocannonTurretEMP_Bond
ThingDef.label: accelerated magnet projectile(antimatter warhead with EMP cells)
